== Notes ==
We had a good pizza eating time!  About with 7 attendees, 4 large pizzas, a few pitchers of root beer and a few pitchers of real beer.

There was some awesome conversation about community development!

== Issues ==
Free Pizza does not much of a competition for free beer...  A free beer/free speech event was announced Monday afternoon.

Reservations were botched but Old Town Pizza made everything work with out any trouble.

The font Comic Sans was used on the flier...  Apparently this is not well accepted by the community (see videos of keynote speakers for further details).

== Postmortem ==
Over all a great time thanks to the attendees.  In the future perhaps we should look at adding such events to some sort of official announcement board.  Also, remembering to confirm reservations are set correctly will be essential going forward.
